attributes.action: treat all Members of Parliament with Tamiflu.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to maintain effective Governance in the face of the possible flu pandemic, we the undersigned urge the mister of health to begin immediate preventative treatment of all members of both Houses with Tamiflu.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
